title: Still No Snow On Japan's Mount Fuji, Breaking Record
content: Japan's Mount Fuji remained snow-less as of Monday -- the latest date that its majestic slopes have been bare since records began 130 years ago, the weather agency said.
summary: Japan's Mount Fuji remained snow-less as of Monday -- the latest date that its majestic slopes have been bare since records began 130 years ago, the weather agency said.

title: UK Far-Right Activist Tommy Robinson Jailed For 18 Months
content: A UK judge on Monday jailed notorious far-right agitator Tommy Robinson for 18 months after he admitted committing contempt of court over a long-running libel case involving a Syrian refugee.
summary: A UK judge on Monday jailed notorious far-right agitator Tommy Robinson for 18 months after he admitted committing contempt of court over a long-running libel case involving a Syrian refugee.

title: "Sure. Challenge Him To...": Harris On Trump's Cognitive Test Remark
content: Kamala Harris said Monday she would take a cognitive test in response to jabs from Donald Trump, and challenged the ex-president to take one too as mental fitness becomes a battle line in the White House race.
summary: Kamala Harris said Monday she would take a cognitive test in response to jabs from Donald Trump, and challenged the ex-president to take one too as mental fitness becomes a battle line in the White House race.

title: North Korea Has Sent 10,000 Troops To Train In Russia: Pentagon
content: North Korea has sent some 10,000 troops to train in Russia, the Pentagon said Monday, more than tripling the previous estimate as NATO warned of a dangerous expansion of the Ukraine war.
summary: North Korea has sent some 10,000 troops to train in Russia, the Pentagon said Monday, more than tripling the previous estimate as NATO warned of a dangerous expansion of the Ukraine war.

title: Joe Biden Casts Early Ballot For Kamala Harris As Election Day Nears
content: President Joe Biden on Monday cast his ballot in the US presidential election, voting early in his home state of Delaware for Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris in her race against Republican Donald Trump.
summary: President Joe Biden on Monday cast his ballot in the US presidential election, voting early in his home state of Delaware for Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris in her race against Republican Donald Trump.

title: Iran Developing Nuclear Bomb 'Stockpile' To Destroy Israel: Netanyahu
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday that Iran is seeking to develop a "stockpile" of nuclear bombs aimed at destroying Israel, two days after Israel bombed military targets in the Islamic republic.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday that Iran is seeking to develop a "stockpile" of nuclear bombs aimed at destroying Israel, two days after Israel bombed military targets in the Islamic republic.

title: Indian-Americans' Allegiance Shifts Towards Republicans
content: With over 5.2 million people of Indian origin residing in the US, Indian-Americans are now the second-largest immigrant group and an important political actor because of their rapid demographic growth.
summary: With over 5.2 million people of Indian origin residing in the US, Indian-Americans are now the second-largest immigrant group and an important political actor because of their rapid demographic growth.

title: Canada Axes Immigration Target By 21%: Whats Next For Indians?
content: Canada, once a country welcoming an inpour of immigration, on Thursday announced that it is expected to hack down on its annual permanent-resident (PR) target to 395,000 down 21% from half a million for next year, 380,000 in 2026 and 365,000 in 2027.
summary: Canada, once a country welcoming an inpour of immigration, on Thursday announced that it is expected to hack down on its annual permanent-resident (PR) target to 395,000 down 21% from half a million for next year, 380,000 in 2026 and 365,000 in 2027.

title: Bangladesh Ex-PM Sheikh Hasina's Palace To Become Revolution Museum
content: The once luxurious palace of Bangladesh's autocratic ex-leader Sheikh Hasina will become a museum to honour the revolution that ousted her, the leader of the caretaker government said Monday.
summary: The once luxurious palace of Bangladesh's autocratic ex-leader Sheikh Hasina will become a museum to honour the revolution that ousted her, the leader of the caretaker government said Monday.

title: 4 Indians Killed As Tesla Car Crashed, Burst Into Flames In Canada
content: Four Indian nationals were killed and one injured when the car they were travelling in crashed and burst into flames in Canada's Ontario province, authorities said.
summary: Four Indian nationals were killed and one injured when the car they were travelling in crashed and burst into flames in Canada's Ontario province, authorities said.

title: From Abortion To Bobcat Hunting: US Vote Not Just For President
content: It's not just the Harris-Trump show: US voters this November 5 will cast ballots for new members of Congress, tens of thousands of state and local officials, and in multiple referendums on topics including hot-button issues like abortion.
summary: It's not just the Harris-Trump show: US voters this November 5 will cast ballots for new members of Congress, tens of thousands of state and local officials, and in multiple referendums on topics including hot-button issues like abortion.

title: 7 Killed In Israeli Strike On Tyre City, Says Lebanon
content: Lebanon said an Israeli strike on Tyre on Monday killed seven people, with the Israeli army later issuing an evacuation call for swathes of the southern coastal city.
summary: Lebanon said an Israeli strike on Tyre on Monday killed seven people, with the Israeli army later issuing an evacuation call for swathes of the southern coastal city.

title: Chinese Woman Uses Plastic Surgery To Evade Arrest In Rs 1.77 Crore Fraud
content: Reports suggest Xie may have used some of her illicit gains to fund plastic surgery in an attempt to evade arrest.
summary: Reports suggest Xie may have used some of her illicit gains to fund plastic surgery in an attempt to evade arrest.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo's Fan From China Cycles 13,000 km To Meet The Footballer
content: Gong's trip to Riyadh was inspired after Ronaldo had to cancel a planned visit to China in February due to a leg injury.
summary: Gong's trip to Riyadh was inspired after Ronaldo had to cancel a planned visit to China in February due to a leg injury.

title: Chaos, Naked Cowboy And Abuse: Donald Trump Spectacle Snarls New York
content: New York is where Trump made his name as a playboy property developer, emblazoning skyscrapers with his name and searing himself into popular culture through media appearances and stunts well before he ran for office.
summary: New York is where Trump made his name as a playboy property developer, emblazoning skyscrapers with his name and searing himself into popular culture through media appearances and stunts well before he ran for office.

title: Down To The Wire: Donald Trump, Kamala Harris In Final Week Push
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will make a final push to break their bitter deadlock as they head into the last week of the most dramatic and divisive White House race in modern times.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will make a final push to break their bitter deadlock as they head into the last week of the most dramatic and divisive White House race in modern times.

title: Record Number Of Women Win Seats In Japan Election But Still A Minority
content: A record number of women have been elected to Japan's house of representatives, projections showed Monday, but at less than 16 percent they remain a minority.
summary: A record number of women have been elected to Japan's house of representatives, projections showed Monday, but at less than 16 percent they remain a minority.

title: President Biden To Celebrate Diwali With Indian Americans At White House
content: President Joe Biden would celebrate Diwali at the White House Monday evening along with a large number of Indian Americans from across the country.
summary: President Joe Biden would celebrate Diwali at the White House Monday evening along with a large number of Indian Americans from across the country.

title: Donald Trump's New York Rally Attacks Kamala Harris, Draws Criticism
content: Republican Donald Trump led a headline-grabbing New York rally on Sunday with nonstop attacks on Kamala Harris, but Democrats sought to capitalize on crude insults from some of his allies' opening speeches.
summary: Republican Donald Trump led a headline-grabbing New York rally on Sunday with nonstop attacks on Kamala Harris, but Democrats sought to capitalize on crude insults from some of his allies' opening speeches.

title: After Disastrous Election, What Happens To Japan's New Prime Minister?
content: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba's ruling coalition fell short of his declared "victory line" of a majority in snap parliamentary elections, media projections showed Monday.
summary: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba's ruling coalition fell short of his declared "victory line" of a majority in snap parliamentary elections, media projections showed Monday.
